faqs.question: Can I see the design before it is made?
faqs.answer: Yes. We share digital previews and, where useful, printed mock-ups so you can understand contours and contacts.

faqs.question: Do you always print these restorations?
faqs.answer: We select printing, milling, or lab ceramics based on strength, aesthetics, and your long-term needs. Porcelain or hybrid ceramics may be recommended for higher-load cases.

faqs.question: How do you check the bite?
faqs.answer: We map contacts digitally and verify them at the fit appointment, making measured refinements to protect the implant and surrounding teeth.

faqs.question: What follow-up is needed?
faqs.answer: You’ll have scheduled reviews to monitor tissues, contacts, and wear. We also outline home care to keep the restoration clean.

faqs.question: Are the materials regulated?
faqs.answer: Yes. We use regulated dental materials selected for their intended indications and explain their maintenance and lifespan.
